Package index

Training models

Functions for training multivariate predictive models

compute_isotwas()
Compute isoTWAS model for a set of isoforms/transcripts
compute_mrce()
Multivariate regression with covariance estimate
compute_omega()
Compute precision matrix between isoforms
compute_blup()
Univariate BLUP on all columns
multivariate_elasticnet()
Multivariate elastic net on all columns with row-wise penalty
multivariate_joinet()
Multivariate stacked elastic net on all columns using joinet
multivariate_spls()
Multivariate sparse partial least squares
multivariate_graph_reg()
Multivariate Graph-Regularized Regression
multivariate_mtlasso()
Multivariate Multi-Task LASSO
multivariate_mtlasso_cv()
Multivariate Multi-Task LASSO with multiple regularization comparison
multivariate_sgl()
Multivariate Sparse Group LASSO
multivariate_sgl_cv()
Cross-validated Sparse Group LASSO with automatic alpha selection
multivariate_stacking()
Multivariate Super Learner Stacking
univariate_blup()
Univariate BLUP on all columns
univariate_elasticnet()
Univariate elastic net on all columns
univariate_susie()
Univariate SuSiE on all columns
convert_model()
Convert isotwas model list to tibble
convert_legacy_model()
Convert legacy model list to isotwas_model

Model objects

Functions for creating and working with isotwas model objects

create_isotwas_model()
isoTWAS Model Classes and Methods
create_isotwas_result()
Create an isotwas_result object
create_transcript_model()
Create a single transcript model entry
get_best_isotwas()
Select best model per transcript from multiple isotwas_model objects
get_prediction_matrix()
Get predicted values as a matrix
get_weight_matrix()
Get weights for all transcripts as a matrix
print(<isotwas_model>)
Print method for isotwas_model
print(<isotwas_result>)
Print method for isotwas_result
summary(<isotwas_model>)
Summary method for isotwas_model
summary(<isotwas_result>)
Summary method for isotwas_result
`$`(<isotwas_model>)
Extract a transcript model from isotwas_model
`[`(<isotwas_model>)
Subset isotwas_model by transcript name

Similarity from GTF

Functions for computing transcript similarity from GTF annotations

similarity_from_gtf()
Create Isoform Similarity Matrix from GTF
create_similarity_from_exons()
Create similarity matrix from shared exons
subset_similarity()
Create similarity matrix for a subset of transcripts

Trait mapping

Stage-wise trait mapping

p_screen()
Compute screening P-value for one gene
p_confirm()
Compute confirmation P-value for one gene
burdenTest()
Compute weighted burden test
burdenTest_all()
Run burden test on all transcripts in an isotwas_model

Probabilistic fine-mapping

Functions for FOCUS-like probabilistic fine-mapping

twas_finemap()
FOCUS-like gene-level finemapping
estimate_cor()
Compute correlation for fine-mapping
get_resid()
Compute residuals for Z-scores
bayes_factor()
Compute Bayes factors for TWAS Z-scores
conditional_test_focus()
Conditional gene-level test
conditional_test()
Conditional gene-level test
